original_title: Manon Martin, première orgie pour ma femme
overview: Manon is a young 22 year old woman, shy and prudish when it comes to sex. Her encounter with Alex, a young, good looking, rich and libertine man, will completely change her life. After an extravagant wedding ceremony and an unforgettable wedding night, Alex begins to introduce Manon to the joys of sex.
title: Manon Martin: First Orgy for My Wife
